body:
Do you mind separating out the errorprone_annotations dependency into a separate PR?
(And before that I'd like to understand the implications a bit more. Currently, the Java maven packages have no external dependencies, which is kinda nice. And for Android does this require some changes to the gradle file or some other configuration to Android Studio to make it work?)
